snippet.title: Danganronpa 10th Anniversary Announcement
snippet.description:
2020 is the 10th anniversary of the Danganronpa series!
Please look forward to everything we have in store!
And stick around after the video for a special message from series scenario writer Kazutaka Kodaka.

The first Danganronpa game, Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc Anniversary Edition is now available on iOS and Android mobile devices! 
iOS App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1502232038)
Android Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.spike_chunsoft.DR1

#danganronpa
